**Meeting Overview**:  
The City of Dallas is hosting a joint meeting of the Government Performance and Financial Management Committee and the Ad Hoc Committee on Pensions on November 7, 2024, at 1:30 PM. The meeting will take place in the Council Briefing Room on the 6th floor of City Hall and will be accessible to the public both in-person and via video conference.

**Key Agenda Items**:  
The primary focus of the meeting will be the presentation of the report from the Independent Auditor regarding the Dallas Police and Fire Pension System and Employeesâ€™ Retirement Fund, as mandated by Texas Government Code Section 802.1012.

**Important Details**:  
The meeting will include a briefing from Jeannie Chen, a Specialist Leader from Deloitte, who will present the audit findings. This report is crucial for assessing the financial health and management of the pension funds.

**Action Items**:  
The committee will review the auditor's report and may discuss potential actions or recommendations based on the findings. No specific decisions or approvals are outlined in the agenda; however, the report's implications may lead to future policy discussions regarding pension management.

Overall, this meeting aims to ensure transparency and accountability in the management of city pension funds, with an emphasis on financial performance and compliance with state regulations.
